Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Infantaricin A (InfA, natural AMPs; two-chain class 2b bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Streptococcus infantariusLP90, isolated from Venezuelan water-buffalo milk

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals this InfA1 sequence is most similar (96.67%) toGallocin DG: 17%; K: 13%; D=F: 10%. GRAVY: -0.35; M Wt: 3357.852; Mol formula:  C151H232N38O43S2; molar extinction coeff: 3105. Chain B sequence (InfA2): DNITKGAYKLGKATRQAAKAIGKAVGKLF.Activity: display activity against S. pneumoniae.
Literature Information.Author: Campanero C, Muñoz-Atienza E, Diep DB, Feito J, Arbulu S, Del Campo R, Nes IF, Hernández PE, Herranz C, Cintas LM.2020
Literature Information.Title: Biochemical, genetic and transcriptional characterization of multibacteriocin production by the anti-pneumococcal dairy strain Streptococcus infantarius LP90.
